description:
Shop quality tools make the job easier. This bottom bracket tool make installation or removal of splined 20-tooth bottom bracket cups slick and fast.

  • Compatible with 3/8in. drive torque wrench, 3/8in. ratchet driver, 32mm wrench, FRW-1 freewheel remover wrench, or 1in. wrench
  • Fits 20-tooth pattern on Shimano®, Truvativ®, Race Face®, FSA®, and others
  • Clears the oversized spindles of ISIS Drive™ and Octalink®
name: Park Tool BBT-22 Bottom Bracket Tool
